column7: accessed=20 February 2012}}</ref>) is an Italian [[J.R.R. Tolkien
column8: Tolkien]]-inspired artist. Besides Tolkien illustrations, he cooperates with Stratelibri,

an Italian games publishing house, as art director. Montanini also teaches drawing and illustration in the European Fashion School of Milan.<ref>''[[CarolinaCon Regional MECCG Newsletter]]'' #5 ([[August]], [[1999]])</ref>
